dagger.name: dagger
dagger.description:
A silver dagger in a leather scabbard, attached to a belt. The blade
looks quite sharp and there are Charter marks etched on the hilt.

statue.name: statue
statue.description: It's a small soapstone statue of a dog. The nose is rubbed smooth.

mouse.name: mouse
mouse.description:
It's a small clockwork mouse, about the size of your fist. There's a
turnkey sticking out of the back. Interestingly, it also buzzes in your hand,
like it's connected to the Charter somehow.

red waistcoat.name: red waistcoat
red waistcoat.description:
A red waistcoat. Looking down, you decide that red is a much better
color on you than yellow. There's a whistle clipped to the lapel.

banana.name: banana
banana.description: It's a banana. Why are you examining it.

phial.name: phial
phial.description: A small crystal phial. It's sealed with powerful Charter magic.

wire.name: wire
wire.description: A piece of wire about a foot long.

key.name: key
key.description: It's a silver bracelet, set with seven emeralds. One is glowing.

yellow waistcoat.name: yellow waistcoat
yellow waistcoat.description:
A yellow waistcoat. It flatters you quite nicely. And so professional!
There's a whistle clipped to the lapel.

chalk.name: chalk
chalk.description: A piece of chalk. Pretty boring, really.
